title: Summary
text:
Summary
In summary, this book has no content whatsoever.

title: Introduction
text:
Introduction
This is a book created from markdown and executable code.
See @knuth84 for additional discussion of literate programming.

title: Preface
text:
Preface
This is a compilation of bioinformatics knowledge at CCMAR-Algarve. First series of hands-on workshop happended in spring 2025. Since the world is spinning, the next edition is uncertain. Therefore, we call for your ideas and contributions already now for the Autumn 2025.
To learn more about Quarto books visit https://quarto.org/docs/books.
